course.subject: HART
course.name: Introduction to Single-channel Video Art
course.description: This introductory course aims at helping students to appreciate the creative potential of video art. Students will learn the theories and practical skills of single video production, with an emphasis on using video as a creative tool for artistic expression and communication. Students will acquaint themselves with the history and development of video art, and its creative concepts. Those interested in furthering the artistic skills and gaining hands-on experience with this art form may enroll in a separate non-credit co-curricular course.
